title: Shitty In The Backchannels: The Chris Klemmer Story
description:
Fresh off his live-streaming performance on Twitch, Chris Klemmer is in-studio to answer for some unkind words levied toward Justin Trudell (00:01:00). The 1995 Mariners appeared to be seeking support but apparently Justin Trudell was not in their plans. Rico joins to discuss his displeasure with Chris (00:40:37). LeBron James made $137 million in 2021 (00:52:25). ESPN spikes a story on Mark Jackson (01:04:00), Chris brings a new game, Madonna's strange NFT's & more.


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/kminshow
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
